code: import axios from"axios";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function AdminDeleteVideo(){let params=useParams();let navigate=useNavigate();const[videos,setVideo]=useState([{VideoId:0,Title:"",Url:"",Description:"",Views:0,Likes:0,Dislikes:0,CategoryId:0}]);const apiUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;useEffect(()=>{axios.get("".concat(apiUrl,"/get-video/").concat(params.id)).then(response=>{setVideo(response.data);}).catch(error=>console.error("Error fetching video:",error));},[params.id,apiUrl]);function handleYesClick(){axios.delete("".concat(apiUrl,"/delete-video/").concat(params.id)).then(()=>{navigate('/admin-dashboard');}).catch(error=>console.error("Error deleting video:",error));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Delete Video"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Are you sure?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card w-25",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{src:videos[0].Url,width:"100%",title:"vidoes"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-body",children:videos[0].Title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success me-2",onClick:handleYesClick,children:"Yes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"btn btn-danger",to:"/admin-dashboard",children:"No"})]})]});}
